EngLawName: Standard rates for National Taiwan Museum of Fine Arts Library Card Applications
name: 國立臺灣美術館資料中心閱覽證收費標準

articles.content: The Standards are decreed in accordance with the Charges and Fees Act stated in Article 10,Paragraph 1.
An application fee of NT$50 for the Reading card would be charged by National Taiwan Museum of Fine Arts library.
The Standards are executed since the date of promulgation.
